00021 #ifndef _DataSetHeaderReader_HEADER_
00022 #define _DataSetHeaderReader_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file DataSetHeaderReader.h This file provides methods to read the DataSetHeader from a file.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include "calvin_files/data/src/GenericData.h"
00028 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/FileException.h"
00029 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00030 #include "calvin_files/utils/src/AffymetrixGuid.h"
00031 //
00032 #include <cstring>
00033 #include <fstream>
00034 #include <string>
00035 //
00036 
00037 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00038 #pragma warning(disable: 4290) // dont show warnings about throw keyword on function declarations.
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00042 {
00043 /*! This class reads the all DataSetHeader information associated with a DataGroup from a file. */
00044 class DataSetHeaderReader
00045 {
00046 public:
00047         /*! Constructor  */
00048         DataSetHeaderReader();
00049 
00050 public:
00051         /*! Reads the minimum DataSetHeader information for all DataSets associated with a DataGroup.
00052          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the first DataSetHeader in a DataGroup.
00053          *      @param dch DataGroupHeader object to which to add the DataSetHeader information.
00054          *      @param dataSetCnt Number of DataSets in the DataGroup.
00055          */
00056         void ReadAllMinimumInfo(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch, u_int32_t dataSetCnt);
00057 
00058         /*! Reads the complete DataSetHeader information for all DataSets associated with a DataGroup.
00059          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the first DataSetHeader in a DataGroup.
00060          *      @param dch DataGroupHeader object to which to add the DataSetHeader information.
00061          *      @param dataSetCnt Number of DataSets in the DataGroup.
00062          */
00063         void ReadAll(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch, u_int32_t dataSetCnt);
00064 
00065         /*! Reads the minimum DataSetHeader information.
00066          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the DataSetHeader.
00067          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00068          *      @return The file position of the next DataSet.
00069          */
00070         u_int32_t ReadMinimumInfo(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00071 
00072         /*! Reads the complete DataSetHeader information.
00073          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the DataSetHeader.
00074          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00075          *      @return The file position of the next DataSet.
00076          */
00077         u_int32_t Read(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00078 
00079 protected:
00080         /*! Read the file position of the start of the DataSet.
00081          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the DataSetHeader.
00082          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00083          */
00084         void ReadDataSetStartFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00085 
00086         /*! Read the file position to the start of the data.
00087          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the data file position.
00088          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00089          */
00090         void ReadDataFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00091 
00092         /*! Read the file position to the next DataSet.
00093          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the next DataSet file position.
00094          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00095          *      @return The file position of the next data set.
00096          */
00097         u_int32_t ReadNextDataSetFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00098 
00099         /*! Read the DataSetHeader name.
00100          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the DataSetHeader name.
00101          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00102          */
00103         void ReadName(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00104 
00105         /*! Read the parameter list (name-value-type).
00106          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the DataSetHeader parameter list count.
00107          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00108          */
00109         void ReadParameters(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00110 
00111         /*! Read column information.
00112          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the DataSetHeader column count.
00113          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00114          */
00115         void ReadColumns(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00116 
00117         /*! Read the number of rows.
00118          *      @param fileStream Open fstream positioned at the start of the DataSetHeader row count.
00119          *      @param dsh Reference to the DataSetHeader object to fill.
00120          */
00121         void ReadRowCount(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataSetHeader& dsh);
00122 
00123 };
00124 
00125 }
